metadata.name: Minted Lamb
metadata.description:
Feast your eyes on 'Minted Lamb,' the world's fluffiest spectator. Our woolly friend is here, nonchalantly munching away, entranced by the drama unfolding before him. Is it the rollercoaster ride of the crypto market, the tumult of the Twitterverse, or just a particularly interesting dandelion? We may never know, but one thing's for sure - this lamb is here for it. Who knew blockchain and barnyard could blend so seamlessly?

Video recorded on the Isle of Kerrera with a P30 Pro, 18th May 2023.
